attributes.action: start negotiations to leave the EU and to establish a free trade agreement with it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU is now primarily a political entity and now has overarching control of our country's laws and ability to make our own choices

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "start negotiations to leave the EU and to establish a free trade agreement with it."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11850.asp

Prime Minister's Office
